trans-unit.source: Defines a metadata attribute that you can use when developing ASP.NET server controls.
trans-unit.target: 定义可在开发 ASP.NET 服务器控件时使用的元数据特性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> class to indicate how the page parser should treat content nested inside a server control tag declared on a page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 类指示页分析器应如何处理页上声明的服务器控件标记中嵌套的内容。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> class allows you to specify parsing logic for a custom server control by marking the server control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> metadata attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>类，可通过将与该服务器控件标记指定的自定义服务器控件的解析逻辑<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>元数据属性。

trans-unit.source: Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(true)` instructs the parser to interpret the elements that are contained within the server control's tags as properties.
trans-unit.target: 标记与元数据属性服务器控件`ParseChildren(true)`指示分析器来解释为属性的服务器控件的标记中包含的元素。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(true,"<Default Property>")` sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A> property to the name of the property that is passed into the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 标记与元数据属性服务器控件`ParseChildren(true,"<Default Property>")`设置<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A>属性传递到该特性的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(false)`, the default value, instructs the parser to interpret the elements that are contained within the server control's tags as content that will be parsed with an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> that is, as controls.
trans-unit.target: 标记与元数据属性服务器控件`ParseChildren(false)`，默认值，指示分析器来解释为将分析的内容服务器控件的标记内包含的元素具有一个关联<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>，即为控件。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The code example in this section contains two parts.
trans-unit.target: 本部分中的代码示例包含两个部分。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页中的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> object of a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>对象的一个名为的自定义服务器控件`CollectionPropertyControl`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A> property to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A> property to the `Employee` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>设置<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A>属性`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A>属性`Employee`类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 页中的类。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the `Employee` class are added declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 实例`Employee`以声明方式添加类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> class is created with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>类创建与<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to parse the elements as properties of the server control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要将元素分析为服务器控件的属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> class using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties" /> property to determine if the elements that are contained within a server control are parsed as properties of the server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties" /> 属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 类的新实例，以确定包含在服务器控件内的元素是否被分析为服务器控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: If `childrenAsProperties` is `false`, the elements that are contained within the server control are parsed as a control.
trans-unit.target: 如果`childrenAsProperties`是`false`，为控件分析的服务器控件内包含的元素。

trans-unit.source: `false` is the default for <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: `false` 默认设置是<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The code example in this section contains two parts.
trans-unit.target: 本部分中的代码示例包含两个部分。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页中的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> object for a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>名为的自定义服务器控件的对象`CollectionPropertyControl`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> is declared before the class defining `CollectionPropertyControl`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>类定义之前声明`CollectionPropertyControl`、<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>设置<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 页中的类。

trans-unit.source: One instance of the `Employee` class is added declaratively and another is added programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 一个实例`Employee`以声明方式添加类和另一个以编程方式添加。

trans-unit.source: The control type to parse as a property.
trans-unit.target: 要分析为属性的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> class using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildControlType" /> property to determine which elements that are contained within a server control are parsed as controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildControlType" /> 属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 类的新实例，以确定包含在服务器控件内的哪些元素将被分析为控件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="childControlType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="childControlType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to parse the elements as properties of the server control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要将元素分析为服务器控件的属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that defines a collection property of the server control into which nested content is parsed by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它定义了一个服务控件的集合属性，默认情况下嵌套的内容将被分析为该属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> class using the <paramref name="childrenAsProperties" /> and <paramref name="defaultProperty" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <paramref name="childrenAsProperties" /> 和 <paramref name="defaultProperty" /> 参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If `childrenAsProperties` is `false`, the elements are parsed as controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果`childrenAsProperties`是`false`，元素被分析为控件。

trans-unit.source: The code example in this section contains two parts.
trans-unit.target: 本部分中的代码示例包含两个部分。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页中的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> object of a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>对象的一个名为的自定义服务器控件`CollectionPropertyControl`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A> property to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A> property to the `Employee` class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>设置<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A>属性`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A>属性`Employee`类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 页中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the allowed type of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件的允许的类型。

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: 控件类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: If the allowed control type is `null`, meaning that it has not been specified, the default type, which is a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control?displayProperty=nameWithType> control, is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许的控件类型是`null`，含义尚未指定，默认类型，即<xref:System.Web.UI.Control?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制，则返回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to query the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildControlType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何查询<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildControlType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关的定义`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`类的使用在此代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.%23ctor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to parse the elements that are contained within a server control as properties.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否要分析作为属性包含在一个服务器控件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to parse the elements as properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将元素分析为属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A> property is set to `false`, the elements that are contained within a server control are parsed as a control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A>属性设置为`false`，为控件分析的服务器控件中包含的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to query the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何查询<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ChildrenAsProperties%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 有关的定义`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`类的使用在此代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> was invoked with <paramref name="childrenAsProperties" /> set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 是在将 <paramref name="childrenAsProperties" /> 设置为 <see langword="false" /> 的情况下调用的。

trans-unit.source: Defines the default value for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 类的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.Default> field is `false`, which means that elements are not parsed as properties of the server control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.Default>字段是`false`，这意味着元素不被分析为服务器控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default property for the server control into which the elements are parsed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素被分析为的服务器控件的默认属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the default collection property of the server control into which the elements are parsed.
trans-unit.target: 元素被分析为的服务器控件的默认集合属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A> property is used only if a string is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A>仅当字符串传递给使用属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> class is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A> property defines the default property for the server control that is being parsed.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>创建类，<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A>属性定义正在分析的服务器控件的默认属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to query the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何查询<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.DefaultProperty%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 有关的定义`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`类的使用在此代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> was invoked with <paramref name="childrenAsProperties" /> set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 是在将 <paramref name="childrenAsProperties" /> 设置为 <see langword="false" /> 的情况下调用的。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否等于当前对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等于当前对象，则为 <paramref name="obj" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 用作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 对象的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the value of the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> class is the default value of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 类的当前实例的值是否是派生类的默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> value is the default instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute" /> 值为默认实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> class is the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ParseAsChildren> field.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>类是<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ParseAsChildren>字段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to query the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何查询<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 有关的定义`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`类的使用在此代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the nested content that is contained within the server control is parsed as controls.
trans-unit.target: 指示包含在服务器控件内的嵌套内容被分析为控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ParseAsChildren> field is called, the nested content that are contained within the server control are not parsed as properties; rather, they are parsed as a control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ParseAsChildren>调用字段时，服务器控件内包含的嵌套的内容不被分析为属性; 相反，它们将被分析为控件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the nested content that is contained within a server control is parsed as properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: 指示包含在服务器控件内的嵌套内容被分析为控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ParseAsProperties> field is called, the nested content contained within a server control is parsed as properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute.ParseAsProperties>字段被调用时，服务器控件中包含的嵌套的内容被分析为属性。
